entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending early this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow early this evening. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 32. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
